pages.text: Pseudo crystals exist as is inside of the Pseudo Ores. Sadly due to our current understanding of Pseudo and its processing, we can only extract a small amount of powder from $(thing)smelting$() of the $(item)Pseudo Ore$().
As you can see here, smelting of the Ore is really inefficient as is at this moment in time.
Through Desktop's tiger magic, we are able to recreate the powder of the broken gems into full gems again, albeit very inefficient.

pages.title: Pseudocrocidolite Storage
pages.text: Not useful for any processes known to us at this point in time, it proves an incredible way to store crystals in a more compact manner.
